MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG9 postcode area of Stranraer. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:58pm. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to repair a grounded overhead power line affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:50pm on Monday, 4th January 2021
